overview: Zodiac Sk8r observes a faceless young punk experimenting with identities and modes of being on a lazy suburban summer afternoon. Vacillating between violence and joy, humor and destruction, our hero is armed with two skateboards, a deflated basketball, pop culture weaponry, and earnest rebellion. Ultimately, Zodiac Sk8r is a simultaneously menacing and silly meditation on the meandering pursuit of youth identity.
title: Zodiac Sk8r
